pages.text: Since researching into the the possibility of foraging your world, various new blocks have been making an appearance on $(bold)the surface$() of The Overworld.$(br2)It might be wise to continue research by collecting these newly-found blocks and using them to their best potential.

A simple glance at your environment and there are sticks everywhere. In the $(bold)leaves$() of the trees, lying on the fuzzy $(bold)grass$() the environment holds, or maybe even $(bold)within the Earth itself!$()

Aside from sticks making their way across the landscape, various small rocks have also found their way onto $(bold)the surface$() of The Overworld. Perhaps if you collect enough of them, you might be able to make yourself some cobblestone?

A direct cousin of the rocks on the surface, more commonly referred to as flat rocks, are found $(bold)just as often$() as normal rocks. You might be able to craft something other than cobblestone once you get you hands on enough of them...
